parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective Takata airbags can explode and cause metal shrapnel to fly, leading to serious injury or death, or may not deploy at all, increasing the risk of injury or fatality in the event of a crash.
symptoms: as the issue is related to the potential failure of the airbag system in the event of a crash.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle's frame may suffer catastrophic failure in a low-speed collision, providing inadequate protection to occupants and increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: Stress fracture and bending of the frame

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure due to Premature Wear of Teflon Seal
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature wear of the Teflon seal controlling fluid pressure for the clutch can cause the transmission to fail, leading to sudden stops and loss of control, which can result in accidents.
symptoms: The transmission goes into fail-safe mode
causing the vehicle to suddenly stop or lose power
typically when driving at high speeds (around 70+ mph) and shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly accelerates out of control
the brake pedal fails to respond when depressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the mass air flow sensor can cause the check engine warning indicator to illuminate, leading to decreased engine performance, reduced fuel efficiency, and potentially causing the engine to stall or fail to start, which can increase the risk of accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The check engine warning indicator illuminates
abnormal vacuum noise coming from the engine
engine stalling or failure to start.
